welcome: Welcome to the abyss. Type [help] to interact.

general.footer: For details on a specific command, type: help [command_name]

help.summary: displays a list of available commands

detailed.description: Provides help information for commands.
Displays information about the techno_punks project.
Displays legal information and disclaimers.
Displays the project roadmap.
Displays information about the project team.
Displays a list of useful links related to the project.
Displays a randomly generated collection of character pairs.
Displays information about the token supply and distribution.
Fetches and displays the current on-chain status of the NFT collection.
Connects your MetaMask wallet to the application.
Clears the terminal screen and displays the welcome message.
Alias for the clear command.
Toggles the visibility of the music player.

lang.summary: Displays the current language or sets a new one.

detailed.description: Displays the current language or sets a new language for the terminal.
detailed.footer:
Available languages:
  en   English
  es   Spanish
  de   German
  zh   Chinese

error.invalidCode: Error: Invalid or unsupported language code.
error.suggestion: Type 'help lang' for a list of available languages.

detailed.description: Disconnects the currently connected wallet from the application.
Mints one or more techno_punks NFTs to your connected wallet.

error.invalidQuantity: Error: You can only mint between 1 and 20 NFTs at a time.
error.walletNotConnected: Error: Wallet not connected. Please use the 'connect' command to link your wallet before minting.
error.missingArgs:
Error: Missing required arguments.
Usage: mint techno_punks [quantity] [--bg #hexcolor] [--text #hexcolor]
For more details, use: help mint

detailed.description: Lists the techno_punks NFTs that you own.

set.summary: set a custom color for your NFT

detailed.description: To set custom color, use:

error.missingArgs: Error: Missing arguments. Use 'help set' for more details.
error.invalidArgs: Error: You must specify at least one customization, like --bg or --text.

get-colors.summary: get the colors for a specific NFT

detailed.description: Gets the current background and text colors for a specific NFT.
Engages the experimental drawing mode.

verify.summary: Verify NFT ownership for Discord role.

detailed.description: Connects your wallet to your Discord account to grant special roles.

about: In a world dominated by centralized powers, the techno_punk movement is an act of rebellion. To empower web3 native souls, we combine punk's raw, do-it-yourself energy with decentralized technology and AI.
At our core, we are a VPL-based, post-AGI survivor club of a multicultural community of vibe-hackers.
Join us as we code the future on our terms.
supply: contract address: will be revealed when Discord server reaches 150 members.
Fair launch: No whitelists, no VCs.
For future plans, community building and marketing 150 NFTs will be minted by code to the following address:
Additional 150 NFTs will go into techno_punks DAO treasury:
5,184 tokens vs 5.5 billion human internet users + 2 billion bots.
By 2027, bots will likely outnumber human internet users for the first time in history.
Do not forget: This moment is your entry equity into the future digital economy.
roadmap: techno_punks don't predict the future, they code it:
│   ├── AI realm: swarm networks and autonomous agents
*The roadmap isn't fixed and not a guarantee*
Community contributions, intentions & decisions can form the direction radically.
Your comments, posts, likes, commits and votes will shape what techno_punks becomes.
On-chain data will tell the true story.
team: You can be a team member by applying to the team channel on discord.
collection: In an era of overdesigned avatars, full of manufactured cuteness to evoke parasocial bonds, techno_punks choose a different path: the characters.
Characters that built the internet. Characters that transform thought into codes, intention into complex systems. Characters that connects human and machine language.
(Press Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter to generate new pairs)
Display: SVG code generated in token URI
Status: 100% on-chain, no IPFS dependencies, no external servers

Wait! Arial? Why? Because it's the anti-design. The default. The system font that refuses to dress up or pretend. It's punk because it doesn't give a fuck about your typography trends. Raw functionality over aesthetic.
# Owners can modify NFT colors via smart contract function calls. Your NFT, your rules.
It's just Punk. In its purest form.
legal: techno_punks is distributed under the terms of the [VPL].
The project is primarily community-led; direction and development may evolve based on collective input.
By using, interacting with, minting, or contributing to techno_punks, you do so entirely at your own risk.
All token related interactions are governed by the codebase of Hyperliquid EVM network. Anyone interacting does so at their own risk.
There are no guarantees, warranties, or promises of functionality, value, or outcome.
No individual or entity is liable for any loss, damages, or consequences arising from your participation.
This is an experimental, creative digital project. Not financial or legal advice.
For concerns about the nature of the project, please contact directly with Satoshi Nakamoto. GL.

terminal.welcome: Welcome to the abyss. Type [help] to interact.

info.noOwnedNFTs: You do not own any NFTs from this collection.
info.approveTransaction: You will need to approve the transaction in your wallet.
info.approveTransactions: You will need to approve each transaction in your wallet.
info.metaMaskRequired: MetaMask not detected. Please install the browser extension from https://metamask.io/download/ to continue.
info.transactionTakingLong: Transaction taking longer than expected (2+ minutes). Please wait...

error.unknownCollection: Error: Unknown collection '{{collectionName}}'. Did you mean 'techno_punks'?
error.invalidMintQuantity: Error: You can only mint between 1 and 20 NFTs at a time.
error.invalidBgColor: Error: Invalid background color '{{bgColor}}'. Please use a 6-digit hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).
error.invalidTextColor: Error: Invalid text color '{{textColor}}'. Please use a 6-digit hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).
error.walletNotFound: Wallet '{{walletName}}' not found. Please check the name and try again.

success.walletDisconnected: Wallet disconnected. To switch wallets, please use your browser extension before reconnecting.

info.colorTxApproved: Color transaction for Token #{{tokenId}} approved. Waiting for confirmation...
info.noNFTsFound: You do not own any techno_punks NFTs yet. Use the 'mint' command to get yours!
info.sendingCustomization: Sending customization request for Token ID #{{tokenId}}...
info.customizationSuccess: Successfully customized Token ID #{{tokenId}}. Transaction confirmed: {{txHash}}

progress.preparingTx: Preparing transaction... Please confirm in your wallet.
progress.preparingBatchTx: Preparing batch transaction for {{quantity}} NFTs... Please confirm in your wallet.
progress.batchTxSubmitted: Batch transaction submitted on Hyperliquid: {{hash}} ({{quantity}} NFTs)
progress.batchTxConfirmed: Batch transaction confirmed! Processing {{quantity}} minted tokens...
progress.txTimeout: Web3 timeout reached, but transaction {{hash}} may still be processing...
progress.batchTxTimeout: Web3 timeout reached, but batch transaction {{hash}} ({{quantity}} NFTs) may still be processing...
progress.minting: Minting NFT {{i}} of {{quantity}}... Please confirm the transaction in your wallet.
progress.txApproved: Transaction for NFT {{i}} approved. Waiting for confirmation...

error.connectionDenied: Connection failed: User denied account access.
error.noWallet: Wallet extension not detected in your browser. Please install Metamask.
error.metaMaskRequired: MetaMask not detected. Please install the browser extension from https://metamask.io/download/ to continue.
error.notConnected: Error: Wallet not connected. Please use the 'connect' command to link your wallet.
error.notConnectedBeforeMint: Error: Wallet not connected. Please use the 'connect' command to link your wallet before minting.
error.notOwner: Error: You are not the owner of Token ID #{{tokenId}}. You can only customize NFTs that you own.
error.tokenNotFound: Error: Token ID #{{tokenId}} does not exist.
error.mintRejected: Minting failed for NFT {{count}}: Transaction was rejected by user.
error.mintFailed: Minting process failed at NFT {{count}}. See console for details.
error.fetchColors: Failed to fetch colors for Token ID #{{tokenId}}. It may not exist.
error.customizationRejected: Customization failed: Transaction was rejected by user.
error.customizationFailed: Customization failed. See console for details.
error.fetchFont: Failed to fetch font for Token ID #{{tokenId}}. It may not exist.
error.setMissingArgs: Missing required arguments. Use 'help set' for usage information.
error.setInvalidArgs: Invalid arguments provided. Use 'help set' for usage information.

verify.connectionFailed: Wallet connection failed. Please try again.
verify.signMessage: Please sign the message in your wallet to continue.
verify.startProcess: To start the verification process, use 'verify <your_discord_id>'.
verify.invalidSubcommand: Invalid subcommand. Use 'verify check' to check status, or 'verify <your_discord_id>' to start.
